value.description: Standard pattern Astartes Power Armour in the livery of the I Legion Dark Angels.\n\nThe Dark Angels are considered amongst the most powerful and secretive of the Loyalist Space Marine Chapters. They were the First Legion of the original 20 Space Marine Legions to be created during the First Founding of the 30th Millennium.

Astartes Power Armour in the livery of the I Legion Dark Angels. This armour incorporates the jump pack associated used by assault marines to quickly engage enemies in close combat.\n\nThe Dark Angels are considered amongst the most powerful and secretive of the Loyalist Space Marine Chapters. They were the First Legion of the original 20 Space Marine Legions to be created during the First Founding of the 30th Millennium.

Astates Tactical Dreadnought Armour in the livery of the I Legion Dark Angels. This armour, more commonly known as Terminator Armour, is an advanced form of powered armour developed for close-quarters melee fighting done by Space Marine Terminators, for whom slaying power is more important than maneuverability.\n\nThe Dark Angels are considered amongst the most powerful and secretive of the Loyalist Space Marine Chapters. They were the First Legion of the original 20 Space Marine Legions to be created during the First Founding of the 30th Millennium.

They were the First Legion of the original 20 Space Marine Legions to be created during the First Founding of the 30th Millennium.

Astates Tactical Dreadnought Armour Helmet in the livery of the I Legion Dark Angels.
